module.name: FreePBX Upgrader
module.changelog: *2.11.1rc10* Disabled a few other modules (forcefully) *2.11.1rc2* disable cxpanel during install *2.11.1rc1* update for 2.11 upgrade
module.description: This module allows FreePBX 2.11 to be upgraded to FreePBX 12, the next major version.
module.attention: You will be updated to the next version. You should make sure you have a full backup of your current system. Version 12+ requires Asterisk 1.8 or later. Once you upgrade, you can not downgrade. It may be possible to restore a backup though restoring a system that has been upgraded can run into some anomalies later on though will usually get you back to where you were.
